017package org.apache.juneau.rest.mock;
018
019import org.apache.http.*;
020import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
021import org.apache.juneau.parser.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.rest.client.*;
023
024/**
025 * A subclass of {@link RestResponse} with additional features for mocked testing.
026 *
027 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
028 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauRestMockBasics">juneau-rest-mock Basics</a>
029 * </ul>
030*/
031@FluentSetters
032public class MockRestResponse extends org.apache.juneau.rest.client.RestResponse {
033
034   /**
035    * Constructor.
036    *
037    * @param client The RestClient that created this response.
038    * @param request The REST request.
039    * @param response The HTTP response.  Can be <jk>null</jk>.
040    * @param parser The overridden parser passed into {@link RestRequest#parser(Parser)}.
041    */
042   public MockRestResponse(RestClient client, RestRequest request, HttpResponse response, Parser parser) {
043      super(client, request, response, parser);
044      ((MockRestClient)client).currentResponse(this);
045   }
046
047   // <FluentSetters>
048
049   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.rest.client.RestResponse */
050   public MockRestResponse cacheContent() {
051      super.cacheContent();
052      return this;
053   }
054
055   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.rest.client.RestResponse */
056   public MockRestResponse consume() throws RestCallException{
057      super.consume();
058      return this;
059   }
060
061   // </FluentSetters>
062}
